ygData.subject: Re: Charisma effect on magic resists
ygData.msgSnippet: I know that with enchanters, most, if not all of their spells are affected by their charisma.  Maybe our enchanter-type songs (such as lull or charm) could be
ygData.messageBody:
I know that with enchanters, most, if not all of their spells are affected
by their charisma. Maybe our enchanter-type songs (such as lull or charm)
could be affected by this...dunno

Taluvil
----- Original Message -----
From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 08, 1999 2:53 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Charisma effect on magic resists


> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
> At 11:30 AM 8/7/99 -1000, you wrote:
> >From: Tom Reece <bamadude@...>
> >
> >I'm really finding this hard to believe. What is the point of having
> >Charisma the
> >primary statistic for bards and enchanters if the only effect it has in
game
> >is better
> >prices with merchants? I wish J.M. was still around to answer the
question
> >to this
> >one.
>
> No - it was later stated that it also has to do with certain Bardic Songs.
>
>
> Talies the Wanderer
> <The Wandering Minstrels>
